dmca.title: Author Tells Google To Take a Bite out of Copyright Crime
dmca.body:
[private]
Bridgeport, Ct 06601
5-19-04

Google, Inc. 
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA complaints 
[private] 
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Sirs:

I, [private], maintain that [private] has breached my contractual editing agreement with him, plagiarized my work, infringed my copyright, and based on my materials, purported to publish and offer for sale his own work entitled "taliban in Connecticut" (previously in 2001, called persecution in Connecticut).

Further, based on the Digital Millennium Copyright Act:

1)		The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on;
http://www.google.com/dmca.html

2)	Query used - "[private]" results in:
		FEDERAL CRIMES
	20 SOPRANOS FBI FILE ...
	ITEMS 20-31

The ENTIRE Website is called: www.anticrimeterror@yahoo.com
Also has the name: BUSINESS WRITING SERVICES - AS WELL AS:
	ANTICRIMETERROR LIBRARY (ACTL)

Domain Name sold by:

Registrant:					Innerwiseinc.com--Itsyourdomain.com
[private]				[private]
[private]@[private].com 		Schaumburg, IL 60193
[private]		                xxx-xxx-xxxx 
Astoria, NY 11106 US			HOSTING SITE:
+x.xxxxxxxxxx				Everyonesinternetinc.com
SUBHEADINGS	OF THIS SITE INCLUDE:	[private]
	antiterror catalog (A)		Houston, TX 77098
	federal Crimes (FC )		xxx-xxx-xxxx; xxx-xxx-xxxx
	Outlaws catalog (OL) 	---------------------------
crimeterrorscenes catalog(c)

Further references to my material, my name are also seen in FC107
		-FC111."TALIBAN IN THE USA; TALIBAN IN ARK, KY, WASH
	; FC PENNSYLVANIA MASSACRE	

ITEM numbered : 215-224
